credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Organ
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. A variation of -1355, the central compartment being framed above the arch. In front of its pipes are two scrolls with festoons and two birds drinking from a blossom. Written above at right, by the man who had to make the choice: "questo". Colored wall.
name: Drawing
